sentence: "There is no one in Pennsylvania who has done more, or fought harder, for Election Integrity than State Senator Doug Mastriano," Trump said in his endorsement.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Trump-endorsed Jan. 6 protestor Doug Mastriano secures Pa. nomination

sentence: PITTSBURGH The victory party took on the feel of an evangelical worship service after Doug Mastriano won Pennsylvania's Republican gubernatorial primary this month.
author: PETER SMITH and DEEPA BHARATH
title: Christian nationalism on the rise in some GOP campaigns

sentence: PITTSBURGH The victory party took on the feel of an evangelical worship service after Doug Mastriano won Pennsylvania's Republican gubernatorial primary this month.
author: Peter Smith and Deepa Bharath Associated Press
title: Christian nationalism on the rise in some GOP campaigns

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) Pennsylvanias Republican nominee for governor, Doug Mastriano, has offered to sit for an interview with the congressional committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol and was interviewed by FBI agents last year about it, his lawyer said Thursday.
author: Farnoush Amiri
title: Republican nominee for PA governor Doug Mastriano willing to talk to Jan. 6 committee
